item.description: I will join HKU this fall as an assistant professor in economics, management and strategy. I am particularly interested in theory-informed quasi-experimental approaches to macro-labor and monetary economics. Here is my CV. You can reach me at mbwong@mit.edu or DM me on Twitter or Wechat. If you’re an undergrad or grad student, I will be hiring RAs (mostly part-time). Email me if interested!
I’m doing 200 hour yoga teacher training at Down Under Yoga!

Upcoming: Instructor for HKU’s PMGM7004 (Global Management from Economics Perspectives) and PMGM7019 (Economics of Strategy and Organization). Previous: TA for MIT’s Intro Micro (undergrad, 2022), Intermediate Micro (undergrad, 2018-20), Applied Econ for Managers (EMBA, 2019), Org Econ (PhD, 2018), and Industrial Organization II (PhD, 2022).
